entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:46 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -39.9°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
